name: SlimeShot
description:
In this 2D platformer  you play as a slime that can bounce around like a slingshot (this is where the game got the current name “SlimeShot”). This game is a prototype so it might have glitches, small bugs. After playing the game please leave a comment of bugs you found, ideas, what you think about it… (it would be very helpful). The game is possible to beat.

Instructions: 

1)To move you hold your mouse, you drag and release it to shoot the slime (in the direction dependent on how you dragged the mouse). 

2)While in air you can dash down by dragging your mouse from down to up.

3)Up left on your screen you have your hp and on the right your coins/points.

4)You collect coins by destroying the wooden barrels with the dash or by waiting until your charge animation is done (the charge animation happens while you drag, hold your mouse while the slime is on ground)

5)You can gain your health back by collecting small slimes/boogers lying on the ground.

6)Avoid spikes, water, and the enemies (the enemies can be pushed without them giving you damage by waiting the charge animation to end and can be killed while dashing down their head)

7)To restart level press “u” key
